summary: The small desert town of Black City is held in a reign of terror by a nasty gang of criminals lead by the ruthless Bud Willer. Earnest, but inexperienced Sheriff Jack Ronson arrives in town... See full summary »
cast: Jack Betts|Fabio Testi|Dino Strano|Benito Pacifico|Attilio Dottesio|Simonetta Vitelli|Michele Branca|Celso Faria|Roberto Danesi|Luciano Conti|Mariella Palmich|Franco Pasquetto|Pietro Torrisi|Antonio Basile|Nuria Torray|Calogero Caruana|Franco Graziosi|Luciano Pallotta|Joel Moore|Alba Maiolini|Marcello Meconizzi
title: Django y Sartana: El último duelo
